title: help me cosplay @lunapark
body: Just wondering haha if there are any good artists I was going to see if someone could like paint a tiger tattoo on my shoulders or something, never cosplayed before but I thought I'd give it a go. :) my ign is HTMekkatorque, facey is Lee Weldon https://www.facebook.com/lee.Weldon send me a message yo. :)
